I love this game but wish you could fully use the controller like how you can in Portal 2 and when playing this on a console.

I would highly recommend Portal to anyone interested --or even uninterested. It is a unique puzzle game that will really make you think (or check a tutorial online :D ). For those who don't know, you play as Chell, a labbrat for Apature Science who participates in a series of 20 puzzle based levels (0-19), where you use a portal gun that can shoot two portals (as the name suggests) to solve various challenges. You are led by the artificial intelligence GLaDOS. The comedy is satirical and similar to The Outer Worlds (another video game I would recommend), while seamlessly blending into the dark and mysterious atmosphere of the game. The levels get a little bit repeatitive around 15-19, but the following is easily my favorite part of the game, and possibly any game, as video games can shake me after the devs get a little lazy. Although the game is short, and I was sad about this at first, upon finishing the game I have realized it is the perfect length for the story, style, progression, etc. But my favorite part of the game is the lore that is simple, but addicting, in a similar sense to FNAF or the Alien movie series. If you search every nook and cranny of the game, you won't need to look on Wikiedia, although reading the Rattmann comics can most certainly help. Just remember one thing while playing this game... The cake is a -*transmition cuts promtly*.
It is such a good game and I recommend it to anyone who likes puzzles, but also likes a good story line and a general good experience. Humorous too.

One of if not the best single player puzzle games ever. The atmosphere and voice acting alone will sell this game for anyone even if you don't like puzzle games. I highly recommend this game for everyone young and old and it truly as stood the test of time.

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.

Aperture Science:
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
for the people who are
still alive.

I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
and killed me.

And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!

Now, these points of data
make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
for the people who are
still alive.

Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!

Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!

Look at me: still talking
when there's science to do!
When I look out there,
it makes me glad I'm not you.

I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
still alive.
And believe me I am
still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
still alive

Still alive.

Still alive.

HARD FOR NORMAL PPL (DONT TRY)
                         
                                        -TBC (GENIUS)
